attributes.title: Nope
attributes.review: This app hacked into my contacts and deleted all of them and kept texting random people telling them to download the app while I was asleep!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app was so horrible. when I opened it, I saw a Cheeto on my screen. also it was filled with a racist, rapist, facist man and they claimed he was a good person??! horrible. this app should be deleted immediately!

attributes.title: TERRIFYING
attributes.review:
When I first opened the app, there was this weird Cheeto looking thing that greeted me, with its fist up. It looked like it was going to punch me! It was so scary I was forced to move to Canada.

O Canada!
Our home and native land!
True patriot love in all of us command.

With glowing hearts we see thee rise,
The True North strong and free!

From far and wide,
O Canada, we stand on guard for thee.

God keep our land glorious and free!
O Canada, we stand on guard for thee.

O Canada, we stand on guard for thee.
